Data Driven Roads 📈🛣️💻

Jul 14, 2020

  • civictech
  • episode
  • govtech
  • infrastructure
  • roads
  • government

RoadBotics Co-Founder Benjamin Schmidt joined us to talk road infrastructure. How do governments make decisions about its management? How might data play a role in that? These questions and more will be answered throughout this episode.
